problems.title: Battery Lights Blinking / Not Charging
problems.description: Specific blink patterns on the battery.
possible_causes: First and third lights flashing: Temperature issue
solution_steps: If temp issue, let cool for 45 mins.
If battery won't hold charge after 2 years, replace it.

problems.title: Loss of Suction / Motor Whine
problems.description: High pitched whine and no pickup.
solution_steps: Wash the foam/felt filters under the dust cup.
Access the HEPA filter near the handle and clean it.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the battery on a Rocket Pet Pro Cordless (IZ163H)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement battery typically costs significantly less than a new $508 vacuum, and extending the life of your Shark is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Rocket Pet Pro Cordless (IZ163H) needs a new battery?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the battery on my Rocket Pet Pro Cordless (IZ163H) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
